component.description: Layout component features a highly customizable borderLayout model making it very easy to create complex layouts even if you're not familar with web design.

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.

attribute.name: fullPage
attribute.description: Specifies whether layout should span all page or not.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style to apply to container element, this is only applicable to element based layouts.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class to apply to container element, this is only applicable to element based layouts.

attribute.name: onResize
attribute.description: A server side listener to process a ResizeEvent.

attribute.name: onClose
attribute.description: A server side listener to process a CloseEvent.

attribute.name: onToggle
attribute.description: A server side listener to process a ToggleEvent.

attribute.name: resizeTitle
attribute.description: Title label for the resizer element.

attribute.name: collapseTitle
attribute.description: Title label for the collapse button of collapsible units. Default is "Collapse"

attribute.name: expandTitle
attribute.description: Title label for the expand button of closable units.

attribute.name: closeTitle
attribute.description: Title label for the close button of closable units. Default is "Close".

attribute.name: stateful
attribute.description: When enabled, layout state is saved in a cookie for the session.
